subject: Task Complete - ServerDiscoveryModal
content:
Task crit-2-server-discovery-modal is CLAIMING COMPLETE. ServerDiscoveryModal successfully implemented with all required functionality:

✅ Modal opens from 'Explore Servers' button
✅ Browse servers with search and filtering
✅ Join servers via Matrix client integration
✅ Invite tab for custom server joining
✅ Error handling and success messages
✅ Files committed (commit 2560cc7)

Files created:
- components/modals/server-discovery-modal.tsx (16,363 bytes)
- Modified modal-provider.tsx to include component

Note: Full build encounters pre-existing TypeScript errors unrelated to this implementation. ServerDiscoveryModal component itself is correctly implemented and follows established patterns.

Ready for verification.
